constant.name: STATE_BEGIN_STRING
constant.desc: A mini state after reading characters which need to match beginString.

constant.name: STATE_MIDDLE_SPAN
constant.desc: A mini state after reading a regular comment char.

constant.name: STATE_END_GREATER_THAN
constant.desc: A mini state after reading the greater than char that ends this comment.

constant.name: STATE_END_HYPHEN1
constant.desc: One of a few mini states for reading the two hyphens which end a comment.

var.name: beginString
var.desc: The string that must be matched in order for this token helper to have a match.

var.name: contentStartIndex
var.desc: A start index for this comment's inner content.

var.name: contentPastIndex
var.desc: A past index for this comment's inner content.
